shows.title: Sona Jobarteh
shows.desc:
The kora is a 21-stringed harp, traditionally played by men only: Sona is the woman who decided to change those rules. A commanding presence on stage, she performs songs which speak of cultural identity, gender, love and respect. She also fights for women’s rights in the Gambia, engaging on issues like FGM, and represents her country on the international stage.
Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme
